overview: Trevor Long, Jacob Peterson and Jake Ashford are on the run out in the desert after scoring a load of money. With the authorities closing in on their tail, they need a new plan. Paul Canon and Arad Winwin are hot on the tail of the three outlawed hunks… but it could do them better to know what the guys on the run actually look like. Arad is tricked by Jacob Peterson, who gets down on his knees and sucks his beautiful cock. Paul Canon enters the scene and the seduction of the officers continues. The men worship each other’s bodies, and it only gets hotter when the clueless cops invite the rest of the thieves to join them in a jizz orgy  .
title: On the Run
